summary: Crude tool for killing actors (dragons in particular) outside console targeting range.
descriptionHtml:
The aim of this mod is to supply a quick and easy way to kill actors that are too far away to target with the console. The solution I came up with is fantastically simple and extremely crude: A thunderbolt called Zeus' Bolt with 1,000,000 damage, accompanied by a ring with fortify destruction 100% (which I then figured out wasn't needed, but what the hell.)
Anyway, it turns out this solution will level your destruction skill something crazy, and I then realized you can activate tgm and walk up to the OP modded dragons that prompted the creation of this mod in the first place, but I've noticed a general lack of op damagers in the cheats category (my first idea was that someone had already made this - they hadn't), so I figured I might as well upload.
Location: Belathor's desk. He decided he owns them, so you'll have to knock them onto the floor or toggle his detection off or use the bucket trick.
Enjoy or whatever. I don't really care.
author: SaraPohl
